alert.note: Alert for Holmes; North Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 6:17PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Geneva, northwestern Walton and western Holmes Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 516 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Florala, moving east at 20 mph. At 508 PM CDT, the Florala Airport gusted to 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Geneva, Samson, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Paxton, Ponce De Leon, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Cerrogordo, Logan Field Municipal A/P, Glendale, Izagora, New Harmony, New Hope, Piney Grove, Caney Creek, Earlytown and Fox Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
